title: Bangers and Mash with Steve Dool
description:
You’re gonna wanna flip this episode on the secondary market. That’s how you know it’s good. This week the boys are dialing in their old boss, pal and expat, Steve Dool, head of partnerships at Depop. Steve is in for a rollicking good time and a conversation that spans not just the Atlantic, but sucking up, first impressions,  baffling moments of British culture, US vs. UK jawnz enthusiasm, brands finally coming around to resell, Megan Thee Stallion’s consummate professionalism, Mark Wahlberg stopping 9/11, and much more on this charming episode of The Only Podcast That Matters™.
 
For more Throwing Fits, check us out on Patreon: www.patreon.com/throwingfits.
dc:creator: Throwing Fits
